# trackFillColor

**Instance Property**

The color of the filled portion of the slider track, in appearances that support it.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var trackFillColor: NSColor? { get set }
```

## Managing the slider’s appearance

- **sliderType**: The type of the slider, such as vertical or circular.
- **NSSlider.SliderType**: The types of sliders, used by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSliderCell/sliderType].
- **altIncrementValue**: The amount by which the slider changes its value when the user Option-drags the slider knob.
- **knobThickness**: The knob’s thickness, in pixels.
- **isVertical**: An integer indicating the orientation (horizontal or vertical) of the slider.
- **tintProminence**: The tint prominence of the slider. The automatic behavior for a regular slider tints its track fill, while a slider with tick marks is untinted. Setting the tint prominence will override this default behavior and choose an explicit track fill tint behavior. See [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTintProminence] for a list of possible values.
- **NSTintProminence**: Controls how strongly the tint color applies in a view.
